p.01703376c4a81c0e9d91: Transform a JSON to an instance of the related Business Model
p.01703376c4a81c0e9d92:
Transform a JSON to an instance of the related Business Model and persist it if was selected.

**This brick is deprecated**, prefer using the equivalent `JSON To Cloud Object` action brick [available here](#editedItem=018162fcbe206603fdf5)
The JSON To Cloud Object Action only supports parsing of primitive properties. The JSON To Cloud Object Function also supports parsing of non-primitive properties, this is an experimental feature that will not be supported in the long-term. It is advised to use relation instead of non-primitive properties. Both JSON To Cloud Object Action and Function support creating related objects.

The properties of the provided json are used as properties of the instance of the business model.

**Example**: ``` JSONToCloudObject({"Latitude":15,"Longitude":25,"name":"GPS Coordinate"}, GPS Coordinate) ->`GPS Coordinate` object. JSONToCloudObject( [ { "Latitude":15, "Longitude": 25, "name": "GPS Coordinate"}, { "Latitude": 13, "Longitude": 22, " name" : "GPS Coordinate" } ] , GPS Coordinate) ->List of `GPS Coordinate` objects. ```
Indicates if the instance should be persisted, default: false
Instance or List of Cloud Object with the related Business Model
